content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5)

### Coal Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity.

### Errors when placing entities with insufficient space or collisions
- Verify that there is enough space and no collisions with existing entities before placing a new entity. Adjust the spacing, direction, or reference position if necessary.

### Errors when refueling without sufficient fuel
- Make sure you have enough fuel in your inventory before attempting to refuel any machinery.
